1.0.name: wordpress/current-age
1.0.description:
This plugin shows the current age based upon birthdate passed through shortcode ([showcurrentage month="1" day="1" year="2000"]) and dynamically updates based on current date.

Can be used to show how old you, your kids, your pets are dynamically. Can be also used to show how many years in business your company is dynamically.

To use in your template files use <?php echo do_shortcode('[showcurrentage month="1" day="1" year="2000"]'); ?>

Only outputs the number so you can customize whats around it.
